text:
OK. I managed to get something working. I changed my node version back to "16.20.2".

package.json has "type":"commonjs"

webpack.config.js is based off the demo 'cms-webpack-serverless-boilerplate' and has target:'node' and optimization: {optimize:false}

tsconfig.json uses "module":"commonjs", "target":"es6"

This has now allowed me to use TypeScript for all functions, outputting each individually and HubSpot can read them.

I haven't had time to work out exactly what version of node works, I still have the serverless.json file using "runtime":"nodejs18.x" too.
